reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup**: Serpent Mini 25mm, Dual SS .22 ohms. 100W power, 500F temp limit. Full Cotton Wicks.

**Testing**: FLV Oatmeal Raisin @ .5% & 3% 60/40 VG/PG, Steeped 1 day, 3% Steeped 1 week.

**Flavor Description**: When used at .5% you get a predominantly raisin flavor from it with some more mellow baked oatmeal cookie notes in the background. It has a light brown sugary butter note that goes very well with the oatmeal flavor. It needs some help on the cookie side of it though. The raisin tastes inline to a dark fruit baked flavor that seems faithful to what it is suppose to be. This is a good base to work with if you're wanting to make a oatmeal raisin type flavor. It tastes pretty good even though it's just a tad bit unbalanced between the oatmeal and the raisin.

At 2.5%-3% this is absolutely rancid. You get a disgusting raisin taste that lingers in your tank/RDA similar to TFA Honeydew. Not much to say for this percentage because you simply do not want/need to use this flavor at this high of a percentage.


**Off Flavors**: The raisin flavor can be a little more forward than you might like but nothing you wouldn't expect to taste from this flavor.

**Throat Hit**: Nothing at .5%-3%.

**Notes**: First impressions were this flavor smells putrid. It's very off putting when you take a whiff from the bottle. This is a strong flavor that will over take everything in a mix if used too high. Keep this low; .25%-75% would be my recommendation. 


**Second Opinions**:

[Bullcityflavors review](http://www.bullcityflavors.com/oatmeal-raisin-flv/) - *This flavor smells strong out of the bottle. Smells almost overwhelming. It is a super turn off until you try it. I had it sitting around for 2 months because I was honestly put off. I mixed it at .25% and it is amazing. Wonderful oatmeal raisin cookie taste. Mix with custard, vanilla, marshmallow, frosting. Super good!!!*


[Alltheflavors](https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/22923#grandma_s_oatmeal_raisin_cookies_by_krucial) has a recipe using it that I tried. All I could taste was a disgusting raisin mess; I personally think 2.5% is way too much.

I recommend this recipe a lot more.

**Oatmeal Raisin Cookies & Cream** - All Flavorah

1% Marshmallow

1% Cotton Candy

1% Custard

.75% Vanilla Custard

.5% Cream

.5% Vanilla Pudding

.5% Oatmeal Raisin

.25% Macaroon
